text: Ye niye owubachesinjia mutsingongo nende munyanza kata shingala mubetsanga mumaro, olwa mutsitsanga nende omuyeka kusangasia, awo omuyeka omusiro kubetsela, mana amarunda kabetsele okhurula buli tsimbeka, mana bachaka okhupara mbu babotokhanwe, basaba Nyasaye nibamutswenula muburii mbu; “Niwitsa okhuwonia mukano, toto efwe khulaba mubalia bakhupa orio”
